review_title: Great culture, great management through downsize
job_title: Mental Health Clinician in Calgary, AB
pros: The people are amazing, working with my clients gets me out of bed every day, management is doing a great job during difficult times of funding change. Very respectful and new structure will help carya stay focused on what it does best.
cons: Never ending funding impacts, lots of change.

job_title: Client Service Coordinator in Calgary, AB
pros: You get a lot of time off and really good benefits including a Health Care Spending Account.
cons: The HR is completely incompetent and so was other management while I was there; however, I believe most management has changed since I left. Unfortunately, the HR is still there and she will throw you under the bus to save herself from looking bad.

pros: Parking and friendly employees. Decent benefits for a not for profit.
cons: CEO lacks vision and is an unskilled leader. Organization unknown in the community.

job_title: Position Not Disclosed in Calgary, AB
cons: HR poorly run, management not professional or supportive
